item.title: Overview
item.description: Provisioning millions of devices in a secure and scalable manner without requiring any human interaction is what our plgd Device Provisioning Service (DPS) solves. Doesn’t matter if you’re running the plgd hub on-premise, off-premise or a fully managed instance, the DPS makes sure it trusts only your devices and provision them to the right plgd hub instance. Exactly no human interaction, zero-touch to provision and pre-configure millions of devices just-in-time and securely, using manufacturer certificates or TPMs.
